Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near  California/37th
ShortDescription: Northbound #94 California buses are temp rerouted via California, Pershing, Archer, Western, 35th and California due to, street blockage near California/37th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Pershing, Archer, Western, 35th and California due to, street blockage near California/37th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 69th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to a door problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
